item.value: Header - Chế độ đãi ngộ, phúc lợi

component.content_html:
When participating in the Mavin family, each employee will receive the privileges that are worthy of his or her contribution to the development of Mavin. Policies for Mavin employees include:

- Create a professional working environment with modern equipment, ensure workplace hygiene and safety regime for employees.

- Competitive remuneration

- Allowance policy includes: attractive allowance, part-time allowance, responsibility allowance, mobile allowance, phone allowance ... These allowances are a part of monthly income, helping employees. Work peace of mind.

- Health care policy for staff members: The health care policy is specially designed so that employees always get the best condition from which to promote creativity, improve work efficiency. including: Welfare programs for employees and their relatives to reduce economic pressure and access to high quality health services when workers are at risk of accidents, illness, diseases.

- Social insurance: Social insurance, health insurance and unemployment insurance are implemented in accordance with the law and ensure all employees are fully entitled to the insurance regime. .

- Other social welfare: bonus on major holidays (New Year, Lunar New Year, Southern Liberation of 30/4 and International Labor Day 01/5, Independence Day 2/9, annual vacation, sewing uniforms, regimes for women on March 8, October 20 ...

- Cultural, sports and social activities for employees: With the goal of building a friendly, solidarity and sharing working environment, Mavin regularly organizes cultural and sport activities. society such as giving gifts, taking care of women on the occasion of March 8 and October 20; Giving gifts and organizing Mid-Autumn Festival program for children of cadres, giving gifts for children with good academic achievements, gifts for international children 1/6; Visiting, giving gifts, supporting families of officials in special circumstances ...
